Aaron Gilmore—

Digital design & front-end development

Working on function and form for screens.

About

Aaron Gilmore is a Berlin-based digital designer specialising in interface design for the web and native mobile, front-end web development, and prototyping.

He is currently working on product design at Dawson Andrews.

Outside of work he likes to travel, read, run, and brew coffee. You can find out more about him and his work in his résumé.

Newsletter

Sign up to receive my monthly publication direct to your inbox. Each month I share interesting articles, podcasts, books, and resources that I enjoyed with such topics as artificial intelligence, computing, design, and science.
